metadata.title: CVE-2016-10350 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The archive_read_format_cab_read_header function inarchive_read_support_format_cab.c in libarchive 3.2.2 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read andapplication crash) via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10350` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.2.2-3.1
bsdtar - 3.2.2-3.1
libarchive-tools - 3.2.2-3.1
libarchive13 - 3.2.2-3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.2-3.1').
